name: Bora Toma Uma 7-8 and Remakes Archive
name_original: Bora Toma Uma 7-8 and Remakes Archive
description:
Bora Toma Uma 7-8 and Remakes Archive is a game developed by TADL Games. It was originally released in 2023.
You can play Bora Toma Uma 7-8 and Remakes Archive on Android and PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
